alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 12:37PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chill readings as low as 23 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Wednesday to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Increased potential for frostbite and hypothermia. Frostbite may occur on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
